```{r}
setwd(dirname(rstudioapi::getActiveDocumentContext()$path))

library(Rgraphviz)
library(ini)

# Read config file
config <- read.ini('./Configs/cancer.ini')

load(file=config$output$miRNAgroups)
load(file=config$output$epigroups)
load(file=config$output$mesgroups)
groupDAG <- readRDS('./Results/group_dag.rds')

nAttrs <- list(
  fillcolor = c(
    '1' = 'red',
    '2' = 'red',
    '3' = 'red',
    '4' = 'red',
    '5' = 'red',
    '6' = 'green',
    '7' = 'green',
    '8' = 'green',
    '9' = 'green',
    '10' = 'blue',
    '11' = 'blue',
    '12' = 'blue',
    '13' = 'blue',
    '14' = 'blue',
    '15' = 'blue'
  )
)

plot(groupDAG@graph, attrs=list(
  edge=list(color='black')
), nodeAttrs=nAttrs)
```
